name: H2FLOW
description:
Get WET this summer with the newest water physics puzzler!

Blast your way through EARTH, ICE, and STEEL as you explore over 50+ exciting levels.

Alter water streams using BOMBS, BRICKS, and BARRIERS to save every drop!

Think fast! Solve challenging puzzles in unique and interesting ways.

Unlock achievements, awesome power-ups, and cool costumes to help you save the day!

Go with the H2FLOW!


Key Features:

* Fun water physics.
* Destructible environments featuring 3 themed terrains.
* Over 50 action packed levels.
* Multiple puzzle solutions per level.
* Cool player costumes with special abilities.
* Share your replays with the community.



Become a fan on www.facebook.com/haptixgames or visit us on Twitter @HaptixGames to receive exclusive news and game tips!
